info.name: Stock Management API (Kelompok 3)
info.description:
Welcome to the **Stock Management API**!  
Manage your inventory effortlessly — from adding items to tracking transactions and generating stock reports. Let's keep your warehouse organized and under control!

### 🔑 Authentication

All requests must include the following header:

``` bash
X-API-Key:{{api_key}}

 ```

You can store `{{api_key}}` as a Postman environment variable.

> _EN: Use this header to authenticate every request to the API._ 
  

🌐 Base URLEndFragment

``` bash
http://localhost:8000/api

 ```

Set this as your `{{base_url}}` in Postman.

> EN: Set this as your {{base_url}} in Postman.

request.description:
> EN: Retrieve the entire list of items currently in stock.  
Useful for displaying the current inventory to users or dashboards 
  

Retrieve the full list of stock items.

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/items`
    
- **Response**: List of items with name, quantity, and unit price.

> EN: Retrieve a specific item by its ID.  
Helpful when editing or viewing the details of a particular product. 
  

View details of a specific item.

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/items/{id}`
    
- **Example**: `/items/1`

> EN: Add a brand new item to your inventory system.  
Only use this if the product doesn’t already exist in the database. 
  

Add a new product to the inventory.

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/items`
    
- **Headers**:
    

`Content-Type: application/json`

> EN: Update the details of an existing product.  
Use this to modify name, quantity, or price of a stock item. 
  

Update details of an existing item.

- **Method**: `PUT`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/items/{id}`

> EN: Permanently remove an item from your inventory.  
Be careful! This action is irreversible. 
  

Remove an item permanently.

- **Method**: `DELETE`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/items/{id}`

> EN: Record an inventory transaction — either stock coming in (IN) or going out (OUT).  
Essential for tracking item movement. 
  

Record a stock transaction (incoming or outgoing).

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/transactions`

> EN: Retrieve all recorded inventory transactions.  
Ideal for auditing stock flow or viewing historical changes. 
  

View transaction history.

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/transactions`

> EN: Generate a summarized stock report showing current stock levels.  
Best used for dashboards or management review. 
  

Generate a report of current stock levels.

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **Endpoint**: `/stock-report`
